text: Tsar' soglasilsya i naznachil Yusufa ministrom. Tak Allakh okazal velikuyu milost' Yusufu i utverdil yego v Yegipte, darovav yemu vlast' i mogushchestvo. On mog poselit'sya tam, gde pozhelayet. Tak Allakh postupayet so Svoimi rabami. On daruyet udel i okazyvayet Svoyu milost' tomu, komu pozhelayet, i ne zhaleyet nagrady dlya dobrodeyushchikh v etoy zhizni
